nodes.text: Ak-Buz was a male Weequay who was the captain of Jabba Desilijic Tiure's sail barge, Khetanna. He was murdered by Dannik Jerriko and his body was found by the palace chef, Porcellus. Gartogg the Gamorrean saw Porcellus standing over Ak-Buz's body, and was told that the Weequay had fallen asleep. Porcellus then hid the body in a garbage heap. The body was later found by Barada.
